official_title: Cohort Study to Determine the Effect of an Educational Intervention Focusing on Herd Immunity to Enhance Vaccination Uptake Rates
inclusion_criteria:
* All legal guardians of children aged 6 months and up who are influenza vaccine-eligible and present to the pediatric clinic.
Healthy volunteers allowed
exclusion_criteria: * Legal guardians of children who are not influenza vaccine-eligible including children less than 6 months of age, children on immunosuppressive medications, and children with underlying medical conditions resulting in an immunocompromised state.
